code: import{useMemo,useState}from"react";import{COMPANIES}from"../constants";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function ServicesSection(){const[query,setQuery]=useState("");const filteredCompanies=useMemo(()=>{const search=query.trim().toLowerCase();if(!search)return COMPANIES;return COMPANIES.filter(company=>{const text="".concat(company.name," ").concat(company.industry," ").concat(company.location).toLowerCase();return text.includes(search);});},[query]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"ll-section ll-services-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"ll-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"ll-section-label",children:"Company Directory"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"ll-section-title",children:"Find a Company and Ask the Bot"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"ll-section-sub",children:"Frontend demo only.
